DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 7 Soft Palate Elevation Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of soft palate elevation in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Soft Palate Elevation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's soft palate elevation during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Soft Palate Elevation
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's soft palate elevation during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's soft palate elevation during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of escape to nostril with or without emission during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Escape to Nostril with or without Emission During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of escape to nostril with or without emission during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of escape to nasal cavity during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Escape to Nasal Cavity During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of escape to nasal cavity during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of escape to nasopharynx during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of escape to nasopharynx during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Trace column of contrast or air between SP and PW

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Trace column of contrast or air between SP and PW
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a trace column of contrast or air between soft palate and pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Trace Column of Contrast or Air Between Soft Palate and Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of a trace column of contrast or air between soft palate and pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No bolus between soft palate (SP)/pharyngeal wall (PW)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No bolus between soft palate (SP)/pharyngeal wall (PW)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no bolus between soft palate/pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: No Bolus Between Soft Palate/Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of no bolus between soft palate/pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
